mapper.select: SELECT /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.selectCsoMtmInq Generator(Generator) 2018-06-21 */ MTM_INQ_SN , INQ_TP_CD , INQ_MBR_NO , INQ_CSTMR_NM , INQ_SJ , INQ_CONT , INQ_DT , ANS_STAT_CD , INQIRE_COUNT , PRCS_COMPT_DT , DELETE_YN , GOD_NO , ERP_GOD_NO , CSTMR_EMAIL , CSTMRTEL_AREA_NO , CSTMRTEL_TLOF_NO , CSTMRTEL_TLOF_WTHN_NO , CSTMRTEL_NATION_NO , CSTMRMOBIL_AREA_NO , CSTMRMOBIL_TLOF_NO , CSTMRMOBIL_TLOF_WTHN_NO , CSTMRMOBIL_NATION_NO , CSTMR_SMS_RECPTN_YN , CSTMR_EMAIL_RECPTN_YN , LANG_CD , MALL_ID , DVC_CD , ANS_EVL_CD , ANS_EVL_CONT , ANS_EVL_WRITNG_DT , ANS_EVL_ADMIN_ANS_CONT , ANS_EVL_ADMIN_ANS_DT , ANS_DSCNTT_TP_CD , ANS_DSCNTT_DETAIL_CONT , UTID , REGTR_ID , REG_DT , UDTER_ID , UDT_DT , STPLAT_CD , STPLAT_IEM_AGR_YN FROM CSO_MTM_INQ WHERE 1 = 1 AND MTM_INQ_SN = #{mtmInqSn,jdbcType=NUMERIC}
mapper.delete: DELETE /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.deleteCsoMtmInq Generator(Generator) 2018-06-21 */ FROM CSO_MTM_INQ WHERE 1 = 1 AND MTM_INQ_SN = #{mtmInqSn,jdbcType=NUMERIC}
